lead_paragraph: England manager Sam Allardyce has defended the decision to leave Everton midfielder Ross Barkley out of his first squad for the  2018 World Cup qualifier in Slovakia at the weekend.

headline.print_headline: England Boss Allardyce Defends Decision to Omit Barkley
headline.main: England Boss Allardyce Defends Decision to Omit Barkley

snippet: England manager Sam Allardyce has defended the decision to leave Everton midfielder Ross Barkley out of his first squad for the  2018 World Cup qualifier in Slovakia at the weekend....
